name: University of Delhi
desc: The University of Delhi, located in New Delhi, Delhi, is a prestigious institution known for its academic diversity and rich cultural heritage. With a focus on holistic development, it provides students with opportunities for academic excellence and personal growth.

name: VIT University
desc: VIT University, situated in Vellore, Tamil Nadu, is a premier technical institute known for its academic excellence and industry interface. With a focus on holistic development and innovation, it prepares students for successful careers in engineering and technology.

name: All India Institute of Medical Sciences
desc: AIIMS, located in New Delhi, Delhi, is a premier medical institute offering top-notch medical education and research. With state-of-the-art facilities and renowned faculty, it prepares students to excel in the field of medicine and healthcare.

name: Manipal University
desc: Manipal University, situated in Manipal, Karnataka, is a leading institution offering diverse programs in engineering, medicine, and other fields. With a focus on experiential learning and global exposure, it prepares students for success in their chosen careers.

name: Aligarh Muslim University
desc: Aligarh Muslim University, located in Aligarh, Uttar Pradesh, is a renowned institution known for its academic excellence and cultural diversity. With a history of producing leaders in various fields, it provides students with a nurturing environment for growth and learning.

name: Indian Institute of Technology, Bombay
desc: IIT Bombay, situated in Mumbai, Maharashtra, is one of the oldest and most prestigious engineering institutes in India. Known for its academic rigor and research excellence, it prepares students for leadership roles in engineering and technology.

name: Chitkara University, Punjab
desc: Chitkara University, located in Rajpura, Punjab, is a leading institution known for its academic excellence and industry collaborations. With a focus on innovation and entrepreneurship, it offers a conducive environment for holistic development and learning.

name: Amrita University
desc: Amrita University, situated in Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu, is a premier technical institute known for its academic excellence and research contributions. With state-of-the-art facilities and interdisciplinary approach, it fosters innovation and fosters talent in cutting-edge research.

name: Amity University
desc: Amity University, located in Noida, Uttar Pradesh, is a leading institution known for its academic excellence and industry interface. With a focus on holistic development and experiential learning, it prepares students for successful careers in various fields.

name: Indian Institute of Technology, Delhi
desc: IIT Delhi, situated in New Delhi, Delhi, is renowned for its world-class faculty and state-of-the-art research facilities. With a focus on innovation and entrepreneurship, it fosters a culture of excellence in engineering and technology.

name: Kalasalingam Academy of Research and Education
